name: GlassFox - stamped tabs
description: Use this together with the theme GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme
additional_info:
By enable this style you will get an illusion of stamped tabs (on the inactive ones).

Intended to be used together with the theme GlassFox http://userstyles.org/styles/45089/glassfox-a-clean-theme (see the screenshots)

Try also GlassFox - change text color http://userstyles.org/styles/45746/glassfox-change-text-color
and the "light-switch" http://userstyles.org/styles/45654/glassfox-dimmer-on-off?r=1301129353
